---
title: Majid Quansah
---

Majid Quansah is a school teacher.  Programming is now
integrated into the curriculum, so can be used in all
subjects.  Scheme can run on a wide range of devices
and is an easily extensible language. Majid wishes to
use Scheme for document processing tasks in history
and literature classes.  Majid also wishes to use
Scheme to automate grading of assignments and to keep
track of student performance.
